body_html:
FYI I'm also seeing this (and I'm also using i686).

I don't understand these things so could be wrong, but it seems like PLATFORM_IS_X86 isn't set when building on i686 with gcc [1][2], and if PLATFORM_IS_X86 isn't set then the CPU info checks fail fast [3].

[1] https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/platform.h#L59
[2] https://sourceforge.net/p/predef/wiki/Architectures/
[3] https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_info.cc#L313

body:
FYI I'm also seeing this (and I'm also using i686).

I don't understand these things so could be wrong, but it seems like PLATFORM_IS_X86 isn't set when building on i686 with gcc [1][2], and if PLATFORM_IS_X86 isn't set then the CPU info checks fail fast [3]. 

[1] https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/platform.h#L59
[2] https://sourceforge.net/p/predef/wiki/Architectures/
[3] https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_info.cc#L313
